key_points.text:
Benchmark Raises Take-Two Interactive Software (NASDAQ:TTWO) Price Target to $275.00
Positive Sentiment:
Wedbush increased its price target to $275.00, highlighting strong content lineup and recurring revenue streams.
Take-Two Interactive Software (NASDAQ:TTWO) Price Target Raised to $275.00 at Wedb

Take-Two Interactive Software (NASDAQ:TTWO) Given New $275.00 Price Target at JPMorgan Chase & Co.
Positive Sentiment:
UBS Group boosted its price target to $285 with a “buy” rating, citing strong pipeline visibility.

Raymond James Financial Forecasts Strong Price Appreciation for Take-Two Interactive Software (NASDAQ:TTWO) Stock
Neutral Sentiment:
Short interest remained unchanged in August at zero shares, with a days-to-cover ratio of 0.0.
Neutral Sentiment:
Analysts set a $234.05 price target, reflecting mixed

Positive Sentiment:
JPMorgan Chase & Co. raised its price target on TTWO from $250 to $275 and kept an “overweight” rating.

Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTWO) shares rose today, buoyed by a slew of analyst upgrades and positive forecasts as investors look ahead to continued momentum and the upcoming release of Grand Theft Auto 6.
